blobs.changelog:
- Passwords handling changed to 'set and forget'.
- CSRF token in critical internal REST APIs.
- Possibility to flash other firmwares than official firmwares OTA removed.
- Bump platform
- Wi-Fi password length limited to 64 chars.

- OLED display sleep UI configuration.
- Baseband thread moved to dedicated cpu core.
- Some refactoring to support multiple watermeters (not yet available feature).
- Add additional Kamstrup manufacturer ID.
- Fix AP mode bug due to changes in platform API.
- Diehl Hydrus 2.0 support.
- Axioma Qalcosonic W1 support.
- BSSID Wi-Fi selectable.
- OLED sleep between radio frames after 10minutes.
- Optimize webUI loading time.
- Minor fixes and changes.

- Add OMS encryption mode 5 support (CBC IV).
- Set device class 'volume_flow_rate' and change from 'total' to 'measurement' state class for HA sensors that have m3/h as unit of measure.
